testcase.name: invalid user regestration
testcase.system-out: Given user is on homepage...................................................passed When user clicks on sign up link............................................passed And user fills redundant details "Ami" "Learner2" "bca@xyz.com" "acbad" "pass123" "pass123".passed And user clicks on Register.................................................passed Then user presented with error validation messege...........................passed

testcase.name: valid user regestration
testcase.system-out: Given user is on homepage...................................................passed When user clicks on sign up link............................................passed And user fills unique details "A7Xn" "Learnor" "new@xyz.com" "A7Xn" "pass123" "pass123".passed And user clicks on Register.................................................passed Then user presented with profile "A7Xn Learnor" welcome messege.............passed

testcase.name: verify blank mail can be sent
testcase.system-out: Given user is at profile page...............................................passed When user clicks on profile menu............................................passed And user clicks on inbox option.............................................passed And user clicks on compose icon.............................................passed And user inputs initials "amit" and selects recipient "amit luthra".........passed And user inputs subject "Test mail new test"................................passed And user clicks on send mail................................................passed Then mail sent successfully.................................................passed

testcase.name: verify blank mail can be sent 2
testcase.system-out: Given user is at profile page...............................................passed When user clicks on profile menu............................................passed And user clicks on inbox option.............................................passed And user clicks on compose icon.............................................passed And user inputs initials "ami" and selects recipient "amit xyz".............passed And user inputs subject "Test mail new test"................................passed And user clicks on send mail................................................passed Then mail sent successfully.................................................passed
